mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(A.R_SEQ) CNT FROM WD_REVIEW A, WD_REZ B
, WD_HALL C
WHERE A.REZ_NO = B.REZ_NO
AND B.WH_CODE = C.WH_CODE AND B.H_CODE = C.H_CODE
AND C.H_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT R_SEQ, USER_ID, U_NICKNAME, WDATE, R_TITLE, R_CONTENT, R_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, R_SCORE_STAR, REZ_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, R_SEQ, USER_ID, U_NICKNAME, WDATE, R_TITLE, R_CONTENT, R_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, R_SCORE_STAR, REZ_NO FROM ( SELECT A.R_SEQ, A.USER_ID, NVL(B.U_NICKNAME , '') U_NICKNAME, NVL(A.WDATE, '') WDATE, NVL(A.R_TITLE, '') R_TITLE, NVL(A.R_CONTENT, '') R_CONTENT, NVL(A.R_READ_CNT, 0) R_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE, NVL(A.R_SCORE_STAR, 0), R_SCORE_STAR, A.REZ_NO FROM WD_REVIEW A, WD_USER B, WD_REZ C
, WD_HALL D
WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.REZ_NO = C.REZ_NO
AND C.WH_CODE = D.WH_CODE AND C.H_CODE = D.H_CODE
AND D.H_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY R_SEQ ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT A.R_SEQ, A.USER_ID, NVL(B.U_NICKNAME , '') U_NICKNAME, NVL(A.WDATE, '') WDATE, NVL(A.R_TITLE, '') R_TITLE, NVL(A.R_CONTENT, '') R_CONTENT, NVL(A.R_READ_CNT, 0) R_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE, NVL(A.R_SCORE_STAR, 0), R_SCORE_STAR, A.REZ_NO FROM WD_REVIEW A, WD_USER B WHERE R_SEQ = #{value} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID

SELECT R_SEQ, R_FILE_SEQ, NVL(R_FILE_NAME, '') R_FILE_NAME, NVL(R_FILE_ORG_NAME, '') R_FILE_ORG_NAME, NVL(R_FILE_EXT, '') R_FILE_EXT, NVL(R_FILE_SIZE, 0) R_FILE_SIZE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE FROM WD_REVIEW_FILE WHERE R_SEQ = #{value} AND R_FILE_SEQ = 1
SELECT NVL(A.REZ_STATUS, 'N') REZ_STATUS FROM WD_REZ A, WD_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = #{value} AND B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_R_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WD_REVIEW ( R_SEQ, USER_ID, WDATE, R_TITLE, R_CONTENT, R_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, R_SCORE_STAR, REZ_NO, REVIEW_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{RSeq}, #{UserId}, #{WDate}, #{RTitle}, #{RContent}, 0, SYSDATE, #{RScore}, #{rezNo}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(REZ_NO,'') REZ_NO, NVL(REZ_STATUS, 'N') REZ_STATUS, NVL(WDATE, '') WDATE, USER_ID, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') TODAY FROM WD_REZ WHERE REZ_NO = #{value} AND REZ_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WD_REVIEW_FILE ( R_SEQ, R_FILE_SEQ, R_FILE_NAME, R_FILE_ORG_NAME, R_FILE_EXT, R_FILE_SIZE, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{rSeq}, #{rFileSeq}, #{rFileName}, #{rFileOrgName}, #{rFileExt}, #{rFileSize}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE WD_REVIEW SET R_TITLE = #{RTitle}, R_CONTENT = #{RContent}, R_SCORE_STAR = #{RScore} WHERE R_SEQ = #{RSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(REVIEW_STATUS, 'N') REVIEW_STATUS FROM WD_REZ WHERE REZ_NO = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE WD_REZ SET REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE REZ_NO = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(H_NAME, '없음') H_NAME FROM WD_HALL A, WD_REZ B WHERE A.WH_CODE = B.WH_CODE AND A.H_CODE = B.H_CODE AND B.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT NVL(B.WH_CODE, '없음') WH_CODE, NVL(B.H_CODE, '없음') H_CODE, NVL(B.S_CODE, '없음') S_CODE, NVL(B.DC_CODE, '없음') DC_CODE, NVL(B.D_NO, '없음') D_NO, NVL(B.M_CODE, '없음') M_CODE FROM WD_REVIEW A, WD_REZ B WHERE A.REZ_NO = B.REZ_NO AND A.REZ_NO = #{rezNo}

SELECT
NVL(C.H_NAME, '없음') H_NAME,
NVL(D.S_NAME, '없음') S_NAME,
NVL(E.D_NAME, '없음') D_NAME,
NVL(F.M_NAME, '없음') M_NAME,
A.REZ_NO FROM WD_REVIEW A, WD_REZ B
, WD_HALL C
, WD_STUDIO D
, WD_DRESS E
, WD_MAKEUP F
WHERE A.REZ_NO = B.REZ_NO
AND B.WH_CODE = C.WH_CODE AND B.H_CODE = C.H_CODE
AND B.S_CODE = D.S_CODE
AND B.DC_CODE = E.DC_CODE AND B.D_NO = E.D_NO
AND B.M_CODE = F.M_CODE
